talk0003:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>That was close... If the others heard me, they'd
definitely chew me out for using slang on duty...<sp:0:2:2:6400>
talk0004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I never would have thought to decorate
my weapon with a ruby.

But now I'm a changed vai! I'm going to
decorate my weapon, my shield, and my
arrows too! I'll be a glittering guard!
talk0010: <sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>If you run out, come see me.
talk0005: <sp:3:0:2:0900>Hey! What do you think you're doing?!
talk0011:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Sarq for before!<sp:5:0:0> I mean, sarqso!


After all your help, you're welcome to
anything you want from our stock here.
talk0006:
Those rations are for the soldiers.<sp:0:4:0>The <clr:0000>sand shroud <clr:ffff>is wreaking havoc on our
supply of provisions right now. Sorry, but
if you need something, check the shop.
talk0012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Now that the sand shroud's quieted
down, we're able to get our regular
supplies from town again.
So feel free to take what you need from
our stockpile here.
talk0007:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Angry>You're here to help, right?! Then get your
bow ready, and fight!
talk0013: Are these enough arrows for now?
talk0008:
I have bows and arrows to spare. If you
need them, just ask.
talk0014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>After what you did, you're welcome to use
anything you want from our stock here.
talk0009: If this will help, it's all yours.
talk0015:
<sp:3:0:2:0900>I have no time to entertain brigands and
thieves. <sp:5:1:0>Get out of here.<sp:5:0:0> Now!
